医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
临床前研究表明，创新的疟疾前药以肝脏为靶点，增强疗效，同时降低毒性他非诺喹是一种前药，可以满足大规模根除运动的标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Innovative-malaria-prodrug-targets-liver-enhances-efficacy-while-reducing-毒性-preclinical-studies-show.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Innovative-malaria-prodrug-targets-liver-enhances-efficacy-while-reducing-毒性-preclinical-studies-show.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdea98a6-c7e9-408d-ad18-83f71f528105 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 10:02:00 -0400 Innovative malaria prodrug targets liver, enhances efficacy while reducing toxicity, preclinical studies show
CN Bio 在首轮 B 轮投资中筹集了 2100 万美元Bayland Capital 和创始股东 CN Innovations Holdings Ltd 分别投资 1000 万美元和 550 万美元。投资将扩大产品开发和组织规模，以满足对器官芯片（OOC）解决方案不断增长的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/CN-Bio-raises-2421-million-USD-in-first-close-of-Series-B-investment-round.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/CN-Bio-raises-2421-million-USD-in-first-close-of-Series-B-investment-round.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b16d5e1-ee9f-4e55-80ee-5b1cf8de5d32 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 07:58:00 -0400 CN Bio raises $21 million USD in first close of Series B investment round

无家可归的人因重新决定混乱而失去医疗补助二月一个寒冷的早晨，在蒙大拿州西北部城市弗拉特黑德保暖中心，塔西娅·埃文斯 (Tashya Evans) 正在等待医疗补助申请的帮助，而避难所的其他人则在为这一天做好准备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Unsheltered-people-are-losing-Medicaid-in-remetry-mix-ups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Unsheltered-people-are-losing-Medicaid-in-remetry-mix-ups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95f46527-f025-4edf-ad58-1bedeb93edac Tue, 23 Apr 2024 06:39:11 -0400 Unsheltered people are losing Medicaid in redetermination mix-ups

加州立法者就果环和免费避孕套进行辩论加州立法者今年继续在卫生政策上采取渐进式倾斜，提出了数十项提案，包括禁止使用 Froot Loops 成分和为高中生免费使用安全套。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/California-legislators-debate-froot-loops-and-free-condoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/California-legislators-debate-froot-loops-and-free-condoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00496e65-42c6-4d80-931c-6ca49698e55d Tue, 23 Apr 2024 06:21:00 -0400 California legislators debate froot loops and free condoms
